Module 1: Introduction to Critical Conversations Module 2: Your Intent Module 3: You Create Safety Module 4: Your Facts, Your Stories Module 5: You Need to Understand Module 6: You Need to Move Forward

Critical Conversations


Challenge

As part of their digital workforce development program for transportation careers, American Public Transportation Association (APTA) required six leadership development modules on Critical Conversations.


Solution

Designed, storyboarded, and developed scenario-based modules that cover some of the most commonly encountered difficult manager-employee conversations in the American transportation sector.


Technologies Used

Audition, Illustrator, Photoshop, Storyline
